mapper.sql: id, name, password, status, create_date, update_date
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
name,
password,
status,
create_date,
update_date,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
